channel.title: Gavin on Mediumish
channel.description: Recent content in Gavin on Mediumish

item.title: Hooli’s Hot New Hardware
item.description: Note: This article originally appeared in CodeRag. When Hooli acquired Endframe, no one could wait to see what the tech giant would do with the revolutionary, middle-out compression technology.

item.title: Gavin Belson
item.description: Note: This article originally appeared in CodeRag. Gavin Belson’s name has long been synonymous with innovation—but beyond his work at Hooli, do we even know the man behind the rampant success?

item.title: Belson Back on Top
item.description: Note: This post originally appeared in CodeRag Gavin Belson’s brilliant leadership is unstoppable. While allegedly taking a personal hiatus from day-to-day operations at Hooli, Belson couldn’t resist brokering a blockbuster deal between Hooli and Maleant Data Systems, deploying Hooli’s innovative new Hooli/Endframe Box.
